verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> unto them that decree <WH2710> <WH8802> unrighteous <WH205> decrees <WH2711>, and that write <WH3789> <WH8764> grievousness <WH5999> which they have prescribed <WH3789> <WH8765>;

To turn aside <WH5186> <WH8687> the needy <WH1800> from judgment <WH1779>, and to take away <WH1497> <WH8800> the right <WH4941> from the poor <WH6041> of my people <WH5971>, that widows <WH490> may be their prey <WH7998>, and that they may rob <WH962> <WH8799> the fatherless <WH3490> !

And what will ye do <WH6213> <WH8799> in the day <WH3117> of visitation <WH6486>, and in the desolation <WH7722> which shall come <WH935> <WH8799> from far <WH4801>? to whom will ye flee <WH5127> <WH8799> for help <WH5833>? and where will ye leave <WH5800> <WH8799> your glory <WH3519> ?

Without me they shall <WH1115> bow down <WH3766> <WH8804> under the prisoners <WH616>, and they shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> under the slain <WH2026> <WH8803>. For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away <WH7725> <WH8804>, but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still <WH5186> <WH8803>.
O <WH1945> Ashurn <WH804>, the rod <WH7626> of mine anger <WH639>, and the staff <WH4294> in their hand <WH3027> is mine indignation <WH2195>.

I will send <WH7971> <WH8762> him against an hypocritical <WH2611> nation <WH1471>, and against the people <WH5971> of my wrath <WH5678> will I give him a charge <WH6680> <WH8762>, to take <WH7997> <WH8800> the spoil <WH7998>, and to take <WH962> <WH8800> the prey <WH957>, and to tread them down <WH7760> <WH8800> <WH4823> like the mire <WH2563> of the streets <WH2351>.

Howbeit he meaneth <WH1819> <WH8762> not so, neither doth his heart <WH3824> think <WH2803> <WH8799> so; but it is in his heart <WH3824> to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> and cut off <WH3772> <WH8687> nations <WH1471> not a few <WH4592>.
For he saith <WH559> <WH8799>, Are not my princes <WH8269> altogether <WH3162> kings <WH4428> ?
Is not Calno <WH3641> as Kark'mish <WH3751>? is not Hamath <WH2574> as Arpad <WH774>? is not SHomron <WH8111> as Damascus <WH1834> ?
As my hand <WH3027> hath found <WH4672> <WH8804> the kingdoms <WH4467> of the idols <WH457>, and whose graven images <WH6456> did excel them of Yerushalayim <WH3389> and of SHomron <WH8111>;
Shall I not, as I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto SHomron <WH8111> and her idols <WH457>, so do <WH6213> <WH8799> to Yerushalayim <WH3389> and her idols <WH6091> ?

Wherefore it shall come to pass, that when the YY <WH136> hath performed <WH1214> <WH8762> his whole work <WH4639> upon mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726> and on Yerushalayim <WH3389>, I will punish <WH6485> <WH8799> the fruit <WH6529> of the stout <WH1433> heart <WH3824> of the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804>, and the glory <WH8597> of his high <WH7312> looks <WH5869>.

For he saith <WH559> <WH8804>, By the strength <WH3581> of my hand <WH3027> I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> it, and by my wisdom <WH2451>; for I am prudent <WH995> <WH8738>: and I have removed <WH5493> <WH8686> the bounds <WH1367> of the people <WH5971>, and have robbed <WH8154> <WH8782> their treasures <WH6259> <WH8675> <WH6264>, and I have put down <WH3381> <WH8686> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> like a valiant <WH47> <WH3524> man:

And my hand <WH3027> hath found <WH4672> <WH8799> as a nest <WH7064> the riches <WH2428> of the people <WH5971>: and as one gathereth <WH622> <WH8800> eggs <WH1000> that are left <WH5800> <WH8803>, have I gathered <WH622> <WH8804> all the earth <WH776>; and there was none that moved <WH5074> <WH8802> the wing <WH3671>, or opened <WH6475> <WH8802> the mouth <WH6310>, or peeped <WH6850> <WH8772>.

Shall the axe <WH1631> boast <WH6286> <WH8691> itself against him that heweth <WH2672> <WH8802> therewith? or shall the saw <WH4883> magnify <WH1431> <WH8691> itself against him that shaketh <WH5130> <WH8688> it? as if the rod <WH7626> should shake <WH5130> <WH8687> itself against them that lift it up <WH7311> <WH8688>, or as if the staff <WH4294> should lift up <WH7311> <WH8687> itself, as if it were no wood <WH6086>.

Therefore shall the YY <WH113>, the YY <WH136> <WH8676> <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, send <WH7971> <WH8762> among his fat ones <WH4924> leanness <WH7332>; and under his glory <WH3519> he shall kindle <WH3344> <WH8799> a burning <WH3350> like the burning of a fire <WH784>.

And the light <WH216> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall be for a fire <WH784>, and his Holy One <WH6918> for a flame <WH3852>: and it shall burn <WH1197> <WH8804> and devour <WH398> <WH8804> his tshofars <WH7898> and his briers <WH8068> in one <WH259> day <WH3117>;

And shall consume <WH3615> <WH8762> the glory <WH3519> of his forest <WH3293>, and of his fruitful field <WH3759>, both soul <WH5315> and body <WH1320>: and they shall be as when a standardbearer <WH5263> <WH8802> fainteth <WH4549> <WH8800>.
And the rest <WH7605> of the trees <WH6086> of his forest <WH3293> shall be few <WH4557>, that a child <WH5288> may write <WH3789> <WH8799> them.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that the remnant <WH7605> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and such as are escaped <WH6413> of the house <WH1004> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, shall no more again <WH3254> <WH8686> stay <WH8172> <WH8736> upon him that smote <WH5221> <WH8688> them; but shall stay <WH8172> <WH8738> upon the YY <WH3068>, HaKadosh <WH6918> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, in truth <WH571>.
The remnant <WH7605> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799>, even the remnant <WH7605> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, unto the mighty <WH1368> 'Elohim <WH410>.

For though thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478> be as the sand <WH2344> of the sea <WH3220>, yet a remnant <WH7605> of them shall return <WH7725> <WH8799>: the consumption <WH3631> decreed <WH2782> <WH8803> shall overflow <WH7857> <WH8802> with righteousness <WH6666>.
For the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> TZva'ot <WH6635> shall make <WH6213> <WH8802> a consumption <WH3617>, even determined <WH2782> <WH8737>, in the midst <WH7130> of all the land <WH776>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> TZva'ot <WH6635>, O my people <WH5971> that dwellest <WH3427> <WH8802> in TZiyon <WH6726>, be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of the Ashurn <WH804>: he shall smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee with a rod <WH7626>, and shall lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> his staff <WH4294> against thee, after the manner <WH1870> of Egypt <WH4714>.
For yet a very <WH4213> little while <WH4592>, and the indignation <WH2195> shall cease <WH3615> <WH8804>, and mine anger <WH639> in their destruction <WH8399>.

And the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> shall stir up <WH5782> <WH8790> a scourge <WH7752> for him according to the slaughter <WH4347> of Midian <WH4080> at the rock <WH6697> of Oreb <WH6159>: and as his rod <WH4294> was upon the sea <WH3220>, so shall he lift it up <WH5375> <WH8804> after the manner <WH1870> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that his burden <WH5448> shall be taken away <WH5493> <WH8799> from off thy shoulder <WH7926>, and his yoke <WH5923> from off thy neck <WH6677>, and the yoke <WH5923> shall be destroyed <WH2254> <WH8795> because <WH6440> of the anointing <WH8081>.
He is come <WH935> <WH8804> to Aiath <WH5857>, he is passed <WH5674> <WH8804> to Migron <WH4051>; at Michmash <WH4363> he hath laid up <WH6485> <WH8686> his carriages <WH3627>:

They are gone over <WH5674> <WH8804> the passage <WH4569>: they have taken up their lodging <WH4411> at Geba <WH1387>; Ramah <WH7414> is afraid <WH2729> <WH8804>; Giv`ah <WH1390> of Saul <WH7586> is fled <WH5127> <WH8804>.
Lift up <WH6670> <WH8761> thy voice <WH6963>, O daughter <WH1323> of <WH1530> Gallim <WH1554>: cause it to be heard <WH7181> <WH8685> unto Laish <WH3919>, O poor <WH6041> Anathoth <WH6068>.
Madmenah <WH4088> is removed <WH5074> <WH8804>; the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Gebim <WH1374> gather themselves to flee <WH5756> <WH8689>.

As yet shall he remain <WH5975> <WH8800> at Nob <WH5011> that day <WH3117>: he shall shake <WH5130> <WH8787> his hand <WH3027> against the mount <WH2022> of the daughter <WH1323> <WH8675> <WH1004> of TZiyon <WH6726>, the hill <WH1389> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

Behold, the YY <WH113>, the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, shall lop <WH5586> <WH8764> the bough <WH6288> with terror <WH4637>: and the high ones <WH7311> <WH8802> of stature <WH6967> shall be hewn down <WH1438> <WH8803>, and the haughty <WH1364> shall be humbled <WH8213> <WH8799>.
And he shall cut down <WH5362> <WH8765> the thickets <WH5442> of the forest <WH3293> with iron <WH1270>, and Lebanon <WH3844> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by a mighty one <WH117>.
